title: Illaoi is the new Darius
body:
* Autowin lane against melees

* Useless against ranged

* Only useful in teamfights if people are dumb enough to walk into you

replies.body: _juggernaught_
*Laughs in Urgot then remembers that fervor got removed and starts crying*
I’ve found that press the attack works great for Urgot.
But mom I don’t want the 18% attack speed !!!
Why not for Urgot?
because his W has a set AS and doesn't profit from any bonus as, and his general AS scaling isn't all that great compared to AD...
It helps a little when it comes to trading through AAs while W is on cd.

yea, but than also be said about AS on mages duering the early lane, doeesn't make it a great stat for them in general.
It's not horrible, but by far worse than raw ad is for him.

Which is why I'm glad that resolve secondary takes some of the AS away and gives HP instead. Still not quite there but better.

They should just give him something that converts bonus AS into damage during W.

Maybe then we'd see the glorious Runaans Urgot lol.
I prefer the AD the sorcery tree offers and comet is pretty good on Urgot
They changed it so that the AS is split for certain other trees. PTA Precision + Resolve will give 9% AS and 65 HP.

Holy hell is that someone with a high IQ that doesn't use fricken Meteor Q urgot?
I generally try to avoid using meteor on anyone unless nothing else works because I hate it.

I actually prefer aftershock, The tankiness from the resolve tree benefits him a lot, mainly with taking conditioning, demolish and overgrowth, usually into domination secondary, and It usually tends to work extremely well into melee's.
Welcome to the league of juggs. Big, strong, scary, slow...
But ultimately useless outside of lane

oh yea

have fun dealing 0 damage
{{item:3069}} {{item:3800}} is actually pretty fun on Nasus. I ran a Sivir down through the entire duration of her ult. It was pretty funny

Phrasing

I {{champion:92}} wasnt {{champion:240}} aware {{champion:58}} that {{champion:114}} darius {{champion:24}} auto-wins {{champion:5}} melee matchups {{champion:83}} 

What a fucking meme, and the worst part is that it's actually believed by such a large population of league players.
He doesn't lol. Thats the whole point of the thread. Darius fell off and Illaoi took his place

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bNA7v9sc,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2018-01-16T01:33:10.788+0000)
>
> He doesn't lol. Thats the whole point of the thread. Darius fell off and Illaoi took his place

He doesnt, and he never did.

The closest he ever got was during pre rework maybe.
After the juggernaut update he shit on melees for quite a long time lol

A decent darius can beat all of those matchups, the only exception being xin.
Stop talking about things you don't understand.
She doesn't lose lane vs ranged tbh, I played fair share of {{champion:420}}  and tbh I did fine vs abominations like {{champion:74}} , which {{champion:122}}  would get completely dumsptered by.
May I suggest taking exhaust against her top lane?  Hold onto it until she ults then laugh as her damage and health regen is cut to pieces.
As far as I know, exhaust has no effect on her healing.
yeah her healing is missing health per tentacle slap, not for damage done
Illaoi has *always* been auto-win against other melee laners. Nothing new here.

Its almost like they exist in the same class or something.

You shouldn't be winning vs heimer lol, that matchup is pure cancer.  He can literally just place a turrent in front of him as you cast e and can out push you and then harras you under tower.
Useless against everything outside lane phase you mean.

> [{quoted}](name=Eedat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=bNA7v9sc,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-01-15T14:47:42.762+0000)
>
> * Autowin lane
> 
> * Useless against adcs mid to late game
> 
> * Only useful in teamfights if people are dumb enough to walk into you

fixed

Honestly her play pattern is absolutely obnoxious to play against in lane as melee.

If you get hit by her E you have to stop laning until you deal with the minigame, and worse than that it also spawns other tentacles so now you cant even trade back anymore if she Ws.

On the bright side, the tentacles are a free 10 gold each and not hard to dodge.
Disruptive sure, but not much else unless she ults.
Right, and even if she triggers the second part of her E, all you have to do is dodge one tentacle slap close to your turret, and wait the duration out, if you dont kill it, a new one will not spawn

She has always been that way. She is a terrible designed champ and a completely bullshit one as well, even {{champion:122}} is less oppressive when in a melee match up and I would argue her ulty is one of the most disgusting things to fight against 1v1 in lane, especially when she keeps spawning tentacles. The most annoying crap is when you kill one and it comes right back in the same damn spot almost as soon as you kill it!!!!!!!!!

She is like a weird bastard child of {{champion:122}}  and {{champion:74}}  imo. Needs to be dumpstered to the levels of urgot pre rework until they can make her not be such frustrating bullshit to fight or trade with.
Can't be the new Darius if Darius is still in the game.

Allow me to chime in a little bit, as a veteran toplaner. Something important that you have to understand about illaoi, her laning is only strong if you let her take over. Up close, she has no cc, no escapes, no peel, nothing to defend herself, besides her somewhat high base stats. Don't be a pussy, dodge her e and q, and go in. You will be able to outtrade her with the overwhelming majority of the toplane roster. Darius is completely different from that, and comparing the two is an absolutely useless practice. 
This whole post is a mess:
Illaoi doesn't autowin against meelees, she autowins against stupid people.
Illaoi is pretty fucking bad against ranged champs, that is true. I suppose if you have a very high skillshot accuracy, you can get by.
Darius is not bad against ranged champs by any means. The only ranged champs that darius can't beat all the time is quinn, because of her autopeel button, and urgot, who can actually just straight up fight darius in some situations, but he's in a different class anyways. If you get on top of a ranged champ, which is not as hard as it sounds, you are going to kill them. Always. The pure stat advantage you have is more than enough to just walk up and destroy a ranged champ. Of course, there are smaller nuances that you have to master, like keeping track of defensive/kiting abilities cooldowns, and just having a feel for a good engage opportunity, but the theory that darius is useless against ranged champions is a gigantic misconception. Some of the easier matchups are ranged champions themselves, like Teemo or Vayne.
The last point is correct abut illaoi, but terribly wrong about Darius. Darius has multiple (!) tools to get on top of the backline with relative ease. Phase rush, black cleaver movespeed, righteous glory, dead man's plate, flash and generally not being a dumbass who walks into knockbacks are all tools that make it ridiculously easy for you to get 5 stacks, get on the backline, and absolutely destroy them with your 1.2k true damage execution.
My problem is that her E have the dumbest hitbox in the game. I could visibly sidestep it and still get my soul taken.

*gets hit by Illaoi E*
Well fuck guess I have two options:
-walk back to my tower and then wander around for 10 more seconds
-lose half my health

Great options all around!

Yeah welcome to Juggernuggets
honestly I don't understand why people have such a hard time fighting illaoi in laning phase. She isn't that bad
I find most of her abilities easy to dodge tbh
Darius is kinda Garbo, and i main him.
